name: SELECT_METHOD
desc: 查询时使用函数的案例

sqlList.name: SELECT_SUBSTRING_FIELD
sqlList.desc: 字符串字段截取子字符串
sqlList.sql: select SUBSTRING(userId, 2, 4) as str from Travel where SUBSTRING(userId, 2, 3) = 'abc'

sqlList.name: SELECT_SUBSTRING_CONSTANT
sqlList.desc: 常量截取子字符串
sqlList.sql: select userId, SUBSTRING('abcdefg', 2, 4) as str1, SUBSTRING('黄河之水天上来', 2, 4) as str2 from Travel where SUBSTRING('abcdefg', 2, 3) = 'bcd' and SUBSTRING('黄河之水天上来', 2, 3) = '河之水'

sqlList.name: SELECT_SUBSTRING_VAR
sqlList.desc: 变量截取子字符串
sqlList.sql: select userId, SUBSTRING(#{str1}, #{start1}, #{length1}) as str1 from Travel where SUBSTRING(#{str2}, #{start2}, #{length2})='bcd'

sqlList.name: SELECT_LENGTH_FIELD
sqlList.desc: 查询字符串字段长度
sqlList.sql: select LENGTH(userId) as length from Travel where LENGTH(userId) = 5

sqlList.name: SELECT_LENGTH_CONSTANT
sqlList.desc: 查询字符串常量长度
sqlList.sql: select LENGTH('abcdefg') as length1, LENGTH('海上明月共潮生') as length2 from Travel where LENGTH('abcdefg') = 7 and LENGTH('春江潮水连海平') = 7

sqlList.name: SELECT_LENGTH_VAR
sqlList.desc: 查询字符串变量长度
sqlList.sql: select LENGTH(#{str1}) as length from Travel where LENGTH(#{str2}) = 5

sqlList.name: SELECT_CONCAT_FIELD
sqlList.desc: 查询字符串类型字段拼接
sqlList.sql: select CONCAT(userId, 'a', '低代码') as str from Travel where CONCAT(userId, 'a', '低代码') = '123456a低代码'

sqlList.name: SELECT_CONCAT_VAR
sqlList.desc: 查询字符串变量拼接
sqlList.sql: select CONCAT(userId, 'a', #{str1}) as str from Travel where CONCAT(userId, 'a', #{str1}) = '123456a低代码'

sqlList.name: SELECT_TRIM_FIELD
sqlList.desc: 查询字符串类型字段去除两边空格
sqlList.sql: select TRIM(userId) as str from Travel where TRIM(userId) = '123456'

sqlList.name: SELECT_TRIM_CONSTANT
sqlList.desc: 查询字符串常量去除两边空格
sqlList.sql: select TRIM(' abcdefg ') as str1, TRIM(' 海上明月共潮生 ') as str2 from Travel where TRIM(' abcdefg ') = 'abcdefg' and TRIM(' 海上明月共潮生 ') ='海上明月共潮生'

sqlList.name: SELECT_TRIM_VAR
sqlList.desc: 查询字符串变量去除两边空格
sqlList.sql: select TRIM(#{str1}) as str from Travel where TRIM(#{str2}) = '低代码'

sqlList.name: SELECT_LTRIM_FIELD
sqlList.desc: 查询字符串类型字段去除左边空格
sqlList.sql: select LTRIM(userId) as str from Travel where LTRIM(userId) = '123456'

sqlList.name: SELECT_LTRIM_CONSTANT
sqlList.desc: 查询字符串常量去除左边空格
sqlList.sql: select LTRIM(' abcdefg ') as str1, LTRIM(' 海上明月共潮生 ') as str2 from Travel where LTRIM(' abcdefg ') = 'abcdefg' and LTRIM(' 海上明月共潮生 ') ='海上明月共潮生'

sqlList.name: SELECT_LTRIM_VAR
sqlList.desc: 查询字符串变量去除左边空格
sqlList.sql: select LTRIM(#{str1}) as str from Travel where LTRIM(#{str2}) = '低代码'

sqlList.name: SELECT_RTRIM_FIELD
sqlList.desc: 查询字符串类型字段去除右边空格
sqlList.sql: select RTRIM(userId) as str from Travel where RTRIM(userId) = '123456'

sqlList.name: SELECT_RTRIM_CONSTANT
sqlList.desc: 查询字符串常量去除右边空格
sqlList.sql: select RTRIM(' abcdefg ') as str1, RTRIM(' 海上明月共潮生 ') as str2 from Travel where RTRIM(' abcdefg ') = 'abcdefg' and RTRIM(' 海上明月共潮生 ') ='海上明月共潮生'

sqlList.name: SELECT_RTRIM_VAR
sqlList.desc: 查询字符串变量去除右边空格
sqlList.sql: select RTRIM(#{str1}) as str from Travel where RTRIM(#{str2}) = '低代码'

sqlList.name: SELECT_NOW
sqlList.desc: 查询now函数
sqlList.sql: select userId, now() from Travel where startDate < now()

sqlList.name: SELECT_DATE_GET
sqlList.desc: 查询年月日提取
sqlList.sql: select YEAR(startDate) as year, MONTH(startDate) as month, DAY(startDate) as day from Travel where YEAR(endDate) = 2023 and MONTH(endDate) = 6 and DAY(endDate) = 11

sqlList.name: SELECT_TIMESTAMP
sqlList.desc: 查询时间戳
sqlList.sql: select TIMESTAMP(startDate) as ts from Travel where 1 = 1

sqlList.name: SELECT_DATE_FORMAT
sqlList.desc: 查询时间转化
sqlList.sql: select DATE_FORMAT(startDate, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as ts from Travel where 1 = 1

sqlList.name: SELECT_DATE_FORMAT_VAR
sqlList.desc: 查询变量时间转化
sqlList.sql: select DATE_FORMAT(#{date}, #{format}) as ts from Travel where 1 = 1
